title: RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT
paragraph1: Getting Everyday Better With Creativity And Continuous Experimentation
paragraph2: More than 12 scientists are working continuously in our F&D, contract labs, and associated research institutes to develop, improve, and innovate the processes and technology to create niche formulations and cater to human health as well as animal wealth.
paragraph3: Process Support Center at Aurinko One Health works on process development, process optimization, pilot studies, pre-validation batches, validation of processes, transfer of technology to the plant, review improvement of processes, helps QA with investigations, and helps the regulatory team answer queries from regulatory bodies.
paragraph4: Nanophosphosome® technology has emerged as a crucial advancement in drug delivery, research, and cosmetics. These small, spherical vesicles, composed of lipid bilayers, are designed to enhance the stability and bioavailability of encapsulated compounds. By protecting drugs or nutrients from degradation and improving their absorption, Nanophosphosome® technology provides an innovative solution for effective therapeutic applications.
line1a: Composed of lipid bilayers that can encapsulate both hydrophilic and hydrophobic substances.
line2a: Provides stability to active compounds, preventing premature degradation.
line3a: Enables controlled release, enhancing pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics.
line4a: Designed for targeted delivery, improving absorption through biological barriers.
line2b: Reduces required dosage while maintaining therapeutic effectiveness.
line3b: Minimizes side effects by ensuring controlled release.
line4b: Improves stability and reduces degradation of sensitive compounds.
line1c: Pharmaceuticals: Enhances drug delivery for improved clinical outcomes.
line2c: Cosmetics: Provides better absorption and stability for skincare and beauty products.
line3c: Nutraceuticals: Improves the bioavailability of dietary supplements.
line4c: Veterinary Medicine: Enables targeted drug delivery for animals.
line5c: Research & Development: Facilitates advancements in nanotechnology-driven therapeutics.
paragraph5: Neuna® particles are extremely small and have dimensions roughly between 1-100 nanometers (nm). Nanospheres are matrix systems in which the drug is physically and uniformly dispersed. Nano capsules are systems in which the drug is confined to a cavity surrounded by a unique polymer membrane.
line4e: Neuna® particles help to achieve maximum therapeutic response with minimum adverse effects
paragraph6: Neuna® Min is a range of highly effective and bioavailable carbon technology-based nano minerals.
paragraph6a: Nano Size Molecules with Superior Absorption:
paragraph6b: 20-100 nm particle size ensures Passive Diffusion
paragraph7: Carbon Quantum Dots passivated Minerals (CQD Minerals) is a highly bioavailable form of supplemental minerals which can be used further for the production of high-quality mineral feeds and supplements.
paragraph8: Bio-cage is a carbon polymer which can be used as a carrier for minerals, including trace minerals and can form nanoparticles after complexation.
neuna_min_prop1b: Enhances catalytic efficiency in chemical processes.
neuna_min_prop2a: Neuna® Min exhibit improved hardness and durability.
neuna_min_prop2b: Used in reinforcement of composite materials.
neuna_min_prop3a: Neuna® Min can withstand high temperatures without significant degradation.
neuna_min_prop3b: Applied in heat-resistant coatings and thermal insulation materials.
neuna_min_env1: Soil Remediation: Neuna® Min can break down contaminants in soil, making it safer for agriculture and construction.
neuna_min_med1: Drug Delivery Systems: Neuna® Min can be engineered to deliver drugs to specific sites in the body, increasing treatment efficacy and reducing side effects.
neuna_min_med2: Antibacterial Coatings: Silver and copper nanoparticles exhibit strong antimicrobial properties.
neuna_min_agri1: Nano-fertilizers: Improves nutrient absorption and enhances crop yield.
